dict.acceptation: 牵连，参与；加入；财政困难；牵连的事务，复杂的情况；

sent.orig: Its disciplinary characteristics include: multi-mental involvement gradual development of mental activity, the dynamic of mental involvement.
sent.trans: 其学科特征包括：多种思维方式的共同参与；思维由低级向高级发展；多层次思维是动态开放的思维。

sent.orig: He complimented the companies in the region for their involvement in the venture.
sent.trans: 他向这个地区的公司表示敬佩，因为它们积极参与投资。

sent.orig: Early involvement an available obstetrician is important to evaluate both maternal and fetal well-being.
sent.trans: 联系紧密的产科医生早期介入，检查评估母婴双方健康状况是非常重要的。

sent.orig: Withdrew from full-time involvement with the company in 1983 when he was diagnosed with Hodgkin's disease.
sent.trans: 在1983年被诊断出患有霍奇金病而辞掉了公司职务。现在参与关于研究空间探索和生物科学的事业。

sent.orig: Political corruption in Taiwan and the involvement of secret societies in local politics are serious problems.
sent.trans: 台湾的政治贪污和秘密社团融入本地政治，都是很严重的问题。
